speaker: President.
english: President. − We will end this debate with a speech by the rapporteur, Mr Foglietta, who I urge to keep within his allotted two minutes.
original: President. − We will end this debate with a speech by the rapporteur, Mr Foglietta, who I urge to keep within his allotted two minutes.
agenda_item: White Paper on Nutrition, Overweight and Obesity-related health issues (debate)
